meanings.sent1: I baked a delicious genoise for the party.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells genoise cakes every weekend.
meanings.sent3: The genoise cake was so light, it almost floated away!
meanings.sent4: Her genoise was a fluffy cloud of sweetness.
meanings.sent5: The genoise melted in my mouth like a sugary dream.

meanings.definition: Made with eggs, sugar, flour, and butter
meanings.sent1: The genoise batter smelled heavenly as it baked.
meanings.sent2: The genoise dessert was a perfect blend of flavors.
meanings.sent3: The genoise recipe called for a lot of butter!
meanings.sent4: Her genoise creation was a masterpiece of taste.
meanings.sent5: The genoise was as rich as a golden sunset.

meanings.definition: Often used as a base for layer cakes
meanings.sent1: The genoise served as the foundation for the towering cake.
meanings.sent2: She carefully placed the genoise layer on top.
meanings.sent3: The genoise base was like the sturdy roots of a tree.
meanings.sent4: The genoise supported the layers like a strong pillar.
meanings.sent5: The genoise base held up the cake like a reliable friend.
